tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive medical knowledge about diseases, conditions, and syndromes based on symptom patterns and clinical presentations.

symptom_pattern.description: Pattern of symptoms to match against disease knowledge base

specialty_focus.description: Medical specialty to focus search: general, cardiology, neurology, gastroenterology, etc.

common_conditions_only.description: Whether to limit results to common conditions only

include_rare_diseases.description: Whether to include rare diseases in the search

age_group.description: Patient age group: pediatric, adult, geriatric

max_results.description: Maximum number of diseases to retrieve

evidence_level.description: Minimum evidence level: high, moderate, low, all

error_messages: Empty symptom pattern: Provide at least one symptom for disease matching.
Invalid specialty: Specialty must be a recognized medical specialty or 'general'.
Invalid age group: Use pediatric, adult, or geriatric.
Invalid max_results: Must be an integer between 1 and 100.
Invalid evidence level: Use high, moderate, low, or all.
No matching diseases found: No diseases match the provided symptom pattern.
usage: Input symptom patterns and search parameters. The tool searches medical knowledge bases to retrieve diseases that match the clinical presentation.

matched_diseases.description: Names of diseases matching the symptom pattern

disease_descriptions.description: Brief clinical descriptions of each matched disease

match_confidence.description: Confidence scores for each disease match

specialty_classifications.description: Medical specialties associated with each disease
